definition: a percussion instrument consisting of a set of tuned bells that are struck with a hammer, to sound a gong
details:
noun
- a percussion instrument consisting of a set of tuned bells that are struck with a hammer
= example: a percussion instrument consisting of a set of tuned bells that are struck with a hammer
= synonyms: chime
- a percussion instrument consisting of a metal plate that is struck with a softheaded drumstick
= example: a percussion instrument consisting of a metal plate that is struck with a softheaded drumstick
= synonyms: tam-tam
verb
- to sound a gong
= example: to sound a gong
